results:
Intriguing storyline within a storyline within a storyline. Only downside was witnessing two of my favorite film icons share a passionate kiss. Perhaps it's my conservative upbringing that made it uncomfortable for me:)

The performances by the entire cast were exceptional. It's impossible to predict who will outshine the others. The final unexpected twist allows everyone to receive their just desserts.

Highly recommend to everyone. A harmless, tongue-in-cheek thriller that, if anything
prompts:

Very well acted by all. You never quite know who's going to out-do who. The last little twist at the end allows for all to get their just deserts.

Recommend to all. A harmless, tongue in cheek thriller which if it has any faults is probably Michael Caine's over-use of the word 'bloody', but that's his signature, isn't it.
